MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 1.
Murmansk appeared on Leipzig's shoulders as we chat after defeating a kidnapping ring
that was causing a commotion in town.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Zzz, zzz...♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, Murmansk is dozing off. The traveling carnival...The kidnappers were numerous, so it was a very long battle. Since Murmansk was apparently covering for me, she must be tired, too.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Munya, munya...eheh, Zenzenman...♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. I'm the Hero of Justice, Zenzenman. Thank you for the help of our little hero. I salute you♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ―Huh?
Murmansk seems to be in a shallow sleep and wakes up when she's talked to. Drool trickles from Murmansk's lips to Leipzig's fingertips, who is apparently unaware.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hnnn? Eh, huh? Why am I...where am I?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahaha. You were sleepwalking, Murmansk.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Waaah, Zenzenman! I-I'm so sorry!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I just remembered! I saw Zenzenman rushing off somewhere, so I got curious and followed. I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I interrupted your work, did I?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, I was also talking to Conductor about this. You weren't in the way at all, so no need to apologize. In fact, I'd like to reward you for helping me with my work.

With the still sleepy Murmansk on her shoulders, Leipzig is talking to her in a friendly manner. She is probably used to dealing with many kinds of people, as she belongs to the Public Relations department in her home country, where she mainly does charity work.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I often hold soup kitchens, and there are many people who are fans of Hero of Justice Zenzenman. Whenever I walk around town, I'm always surprised by the crowds of children.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Eheh, you're cool and so popular, Zenzenman.
I love you, too...♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thank you, Murmansk. I'm so lucky. I'm a soldier whose fate is to be covered in blood on the battlefield, and yet I'm loved by everyone...When I was a child, I never dreamed that I would grow up to be such a person.
By the way, what kind of kid were you, Leipzig? I can't really imagine your childhood― I can only imagine that you've always been like this.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What do you mean, "like this"? Although it's true that I've always been this kind of warrior who can't even laugh cutely.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
What? Zenzenman, you're very, very cute♪
Plus, you're strong and cool and you smell amazing and delicious!

Leipzig smiles softly at Murmansk, who does her best at praising.
She casually said that Leipzig looks delicious and I think it might annoy her.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thank you very much, I feel my efforts have been rewarded. I've been a clumsy and uncommunicative simpleton since I was a child, and I've never received much praise, so I'm very happy.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, lately people have been praising me, sometimes even calling me a hero... It's such a shame that I've received such high praise.
I think it's a fair assessment. You've won many victories on the battlefield and have given people hope and enjoyment in movies. You deserve to be called a hero.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, I feel like I'm being praised to death, and it makes me uncomfortable.
Leipzig has a distant look in her eyes, her cheeks tinted uncharacteristically.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
...I'm just pretending to be a natural-born soldier.
Originally, I was just a simple village girl who had never held a weapon in her hands.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But...One day, my hometown was invaded by Mist, overrun by monsters, and destroyed. Fortunately or unfortunately, I survived, and while the monsters ran rampant, I hid in a granary, suffocating―

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I was taken in by the Eisengrad army, who rushed to the scene. I had lost all my relatives and was taken in by a kind-hearted person who adopted me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Because she was a soldier, I wanted to repay her in any way I could, so I chose the same path. I chose the path of a soldier who fights for justice and for her country.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I was a country girl who could till the soil but had never seen a gun.
But through hard work, transformation, encounters and good fortune, I am now a hero.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
All at once, my family was killed, my hometown was trampled,
and I could do nothing but tremble. Even I think it's a strange fate.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Leipzig...

Unusually, Murmansk calls her by her real name, not Zenzenman,
and as she's on Leipzig's shoulders, she hugs her with her whole body.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That must have been so hard. You must have been sad.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What? It's not uncommon for a misfortune like the one I experienced to occur in this world where the threat of Mist still swirls. No, that's why it's worthwhile for me to put on a military uniform, pick up a gun and fight.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: For the sake of the children who, like me when I was young, can do nothing but tremble and cry as they suffer from strange disasters. I must show them that there is hope and justice in this world that shines brightly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I will fight, today, tomorrow, and always.
Continue to Episode 3.
